definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Changes have also occurred stealthily/quietly in recreational consumption during holiday seasons.
sentences.chinese: 從節假日購物消費來看，同樣也在悄然發生着變化。

sentences.english: the deadline fall in the vacation or holiday , it can be put off in turn .
sentences.chinese: 不過期限的最後一日如果是節假日，可以順延。

sentences.english: Diarmuid: Spring Festival is a big holiday period.
sentences.chinese: 春節是最重要的節假日。

sentences.english: The road toll is higher during holiday periods .
sentences.chinese: 在節假日期間路橋費比以往要貴。

sentences.english: They also have Christmas to New Year’s, Easter and Thanksgiving holidays.
sentences.chinese: 他們還有聖誕節至元旦，復活節和感恩節假日。

sentences.english: 1894 - Labor Day becomes an official US holiday.
sentences.chinese: 1894年的今天，勞動節成爲美國的官方節假日。

sentences.english: Japan's market was closed for a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 日本股市因爲法定節假日，今天沒有開盤。

sentences.english: The Qingming Festival is a  statutory public holiday in mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 清明節在中國大陸地區是法定節假日。

sentences.english: Review the 9 holidays of P48. Part B.
sentences.chinese: 教師帶領學生複習鞏固節假日名稱。

sentences.english: My father spent a busman's holiday working in his office.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸的節假日有名無實，整個假期他都呆在辦公室。

sentences.english: Like decorating your house for the holidays or creating a piece of art.
sentences.chinese: 比如說爲了節假日裝修你的房子或者做一件藝術品。

sentences.english: My friend is going to stay with me during the holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我朋友節假日要來我這裏住幾天。

sentences.english: It's the palette of holiday culinary creativity.
sentences.chinese: 這是節假日烹調創意的主色調。

sentences.english: On holiday, eel -catcher lovers in the city will also bring their children to the country to catch eel .
sentences.chinese: 節假日，市內的釣蟮愛好者也常帶着孩子來郊外覓蟮。

sentences.english: Now it is not allowed to set off firecrackers in big cities on festivals.
sentences.chinese: 現在大城市在節假日裏不允許燃放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Tell them to restore Diwali holiday for Hindus living in UK.
sentences.chinese: 叫他們爲生活在英國的印度教徒恢復排燈節假日。

definition: time interval/work shift/time slot/the twelve two-hour divisions of the day
to enter the venue for a meeting/to enter into an examination/to enter a stadium, arena etc
to close a door/to lock a door/(of a shop etc) to close (for the night, or permanently)
time of going to work/the morning rush hour
